title: Coloring Page
content: Jesus Christ Heals the Ten Lepers

And they lifted up their voices, and said, Jesus, Master, have mercy on us. And when he saw them, he said unto them, Go shew yourselves unto the priests. And it came to pass, that, as they went, they were cleansed. And one of them, when he saw that he was healed, turned back, and with a loud voice glorified God. … And he said unto him, Arise, go thy way: thy faith hath made thee whole
